statements: SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, party1, party2 FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT party1, party2, message FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE party1 LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, message FROM CommunicationLogs ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE party1 = 'Alice' AND party2 = 'Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, party1, party2, timestamp FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT party1, party2, COUNT(*) AS num_of_messages FROM CommunicationLogs GROUP BY party1, party2 HAVING num_of_messages > 3
SELECT id, party1, party2, message, timestamp FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE party1 LIKE '%a%' AND message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT party1, party2, DATE(timestamp) AS date_only FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE party1 != party2 GROUP BY date_only ORDER BY date_only DESC
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE party1_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, message FROM communication_logs WHERE party1_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT party1_id, party2_id, COUNT(*) FROM communication_logs GROUP BY party1_id, party2_id;
SELECT * FROM negotiation WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT party1_id, party2_id, MAX(end_timestamp) AS latest_end_timestamp FROM negotiations GROUP BY party1_id, party2_id;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE party1_id = 1 AND party2_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT party1_id, party2_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM communication_logs GROUP BY party1_id, party2_id;
SELECT negotiation_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp, status FROM negotiations WHERE party1_id = 2 ORDER BY start_timestamp DESC;
SELECT party1_id, party2_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (end_timestamp - start_timestamp))) AS avg_duration FROM negotiations WHERE status = 'completed' GROUP BY party1_id, party2_id;
SELECT party1_id, party2_id, COUNT(*) AS total_negotiations FROM negotiations GROUP BY party1_id, party2_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs;
SELECT party_1, message FROM Negotiations WHERE negotiation_id = 3;
SELECT party_1, party_2, outcome FROM Negotiations WHERE negotiation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_date, party_1 FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT party_1, party_2, resolution FROM ConflictHistory WHERE party_1 = 'Alice' AND party_2 = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT party_1, party_2, message FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE party_1='Alice' AND party_2='Bob';
SELECT log_date, party_1, party_2, message FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE party_1='Alice' OR party_2='Bob' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT negotiation_id, party_1, party_2, outcome FROM Negotiations WHERE negotiation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY negotiation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ConflictHistory WHERE party_1='Charlie' AND resolution='Agreed' ORDER BY conflict_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT party_1_id, message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE party_2_id = '72632709-8f62-4177-a7cb-e26f6a697620';
SELECT party_1_id, party_2_id, message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT negotiation_topic, outcome FROM negotiation_logs WHERE outcome = 'Agreement';
SELECT * FROM party_details WHERE party_type = 'Organization';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT negotiation_topic, outcome FROM negotiation_logs WHERE party_1_id = '1f3f821a-3ff2-4fa0-bb80-5060b2f1206f';
SELECT party_name, party_type, contact_info FROM party_details WHERE party_type = 'Organization' LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT conflict_id, resolution FROM conflict_history ORDER BY conflict_id ASC;
SELECT message FROM communication_logs WHERE party_1_id = '7a8b3c19-94ba-4b6b-9b4d-0e95d087cc4f' AND party_2_id = '24c7e2b9-21f3-4a55-b378-cdc394d620f2';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_content FROM communication_logs WHERE party_involved='Company A';
SELECT negotiation_id, negotiation_topic, party1, party2 FROM negotiations ORDER BY negotiation_date DESC;
SELECT party_id, party_name, party_type FROM conflict_parties WHERE party_type='Government' ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_date, resolution_description, resolution_id FROM resolutions WHERE resolved_by='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT party_involved, COUNT(*) FROM communication_logs GROUP BY party_involved HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM conflict_parties WHERE party_type = 'Government' OR party_type = 'Corporation';
SELECT resolution_date, resolution_description FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT negotiation_topic, party1, party2 FROM negotiations WHERE negotiation_topic LIKE '%agreement%';
